analysis.description:
PetlifeCrowdsale.token (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol#793) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.token (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol#460-461)

Reentrancy in PetlifeCrowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol#842-872):
	External calls:
	- (stage == CrowdsaleStage.ICOSecondStage) && (token.totalSupply() > saleCap - thirdStageCap) (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol#863-866)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusPercent (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol#866)

Reentrancy in PetlifeCrowdsale.finish (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol#880-885):
	External calls:
	- alreadyMinted = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol)
	- token.mint(_teamFund,tokensForTeam) (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol)
	- token.mint(_bountyFund,tokensForBounty) (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol)
	- token.mint(_reserveFund,tokensForReserve) (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol)
	- token.mint(_advisoryFund,tokensForAdvisors) (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol)
_stage in PetlifeCrowdsale.setCrowdsaleStage (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol#807) is a local variable never initialiazed

PetlifeCrowdsale.finish (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol#880-885) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_teamFund,tokensForTeam) (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol)
	-token.mint(_bountyFund,tokensForBounty) (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol)
	-token.mint(_reserveFund,tokensForReserve) (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol)
	-token.mint(_advisoryFund,tokensForAdvisors) (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol)

PetlifeCrowdsale.mintManually (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,_amount * 10 ** 18) (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol#716-722) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol#719-722)

PetlifeCrowdsale.firstStageCap should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x55bd5d5622a5a321f0b719e1c8deda9ba21e4f80.sol#784-786)
